topics.body:
Reading a manga how a dude saved a fairy from drowning and that fairy gave him one wish.

He wished that he had a childhood girlfriend.

That ultimately turned his best friend (who is also his childhood friend) into a girl.

His friend was not happy (obviously) and was able to transform back into a guy. He then kept fighting the fairy who keeps on trying to turn him into a girl because she cannot stand that her pride as a fairy is being tarnished by a dude who has the willpower to break her magic. He keeps getting transformed from guy to gal and to guy again from time to time, usually at school. If he loses focus that he is a guy, he becomes a girl. Also, their homeroom teacher is jealous that a guy (turned girl) has bigger boobs than her.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
